name: Heat Burst
notes:
* Heat Burst
* Cancel to r45 with b,b
* 3 chip damage on block
* 12 chip damage on hit
* Only deals recoverable damage
* Cannot cause a K.O.
Power crush 7~16

notes:
* Rage Art
* Reversal Break

* Freezes match timer on activation and on hit
* Transition to attack throw on hit
* Consumes Rage
Power crush 8~
